title: Bug 17618Changing output location should delete all derived resources
description: F11) create a project (autobuild on)2) import Java sources and resources3) change output folder to project/binall class files are removed (fine)4) change output folder back to be the project all class files are removed (fine)5) open project/bin all resources are still thereNote: When opening the properties dialog on such a resource it is taggedas "Derived". Thus, it should be possible to remove all derived resources aslong as they have been created by the Java builder.
